document.full_text: kimberly-clark corp  posted a lower quarterly profit on monday and said this year's earnings could come in below earlier expectations as costs for pulp and other goods are rising more than twice as much as it expected.
document.title: kimberly-clark profit falls, weighed down by costs
lines_and_colors: kimberly-clark corp  posted a lower quarterly profit on monday and said this year's earnings could come in below earlier expectations as costs for pulp and other goods are rising more than twice as much as it expected.
